Description: Beacon Hill top floor 1 bedroom for September 1! Great Hancock Street location for this spacious 5th floor apartment featuring hardwood floors throughout. Corner unit with open kitchen/living room space and decorative fireplace. Large enough for a desk as well. Kitchen has a dishwasher, bedroom has a extra deep closet. Heat, hot water AND electricity included! Common laundry in the building, and great common 1st floor outdoor space! Pets considered. 9/1 move in.
